resources.string: Demonstrate invoking a simple SOAP web service with no arguments, and a response containing a straighforward list structure.
An error occured while attempting to invoke the web service. Please refer to the LogCat for a detailed error description.
Successfully invoked the GetWeatherInfo web service!
Demonstrate invoking a SOAP web service with multiple input arguments and complex response structure.
An error occured while attempting to invoke the GetCityForcast web service. Please refer to the LogCat for a detailed error description.
